title: THE PHIL SILVERS SPECIAL -- The Slowest Gun in the West
description:
One year after his famous sitcom was cancelled,  I read this was intended as a pilot for a Phil Silvers series "The Slowest Gun in the West" that didn't sell.   Whether that's true or not, this is definitely a TV special filmed in 1960, that also happens to be in the public domain.  It was Phil's second one after "The Ballad of Louie the Louse" the season before.

Also with Jack Benny ( pictured above with Phil ), Jack Elam, Lee Van Cleef, 
Robert Wilke, Parley Baer, Jack Albertson, Bruce Cabot, Kathie Browne,
Marion Ross, Gina Gillespie, George Chandler, Ted De Corsia, and Jeanne Bates.
